mapper.select: select mc_no , mc_name , mc_status , mc_img , to_char(mc_enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "mc_enroll_date" from tb_machine order by mc_no
mapper.insert: insert into tb_machine ( mc_no , mc_name , mc_status , mc_img , mc_enroll_date ) values ( seq_mc_no.nextval , #{mcName} , '1' , #{mcImg} , sysdate )
mapper.select: select ck_no , to_char(ck_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ck_date" , ck_content , ck_img , ck_result , mc_name as "mc_name" , ck_title , e.emp_name "ck_writer_name" from tb_check c, tb_machine m, tb_emp e where c.mc_no = m.mc_no and c.ck_writer = e.emp_no order by ck_no desc

select ck_title , ck_no , mc_no , mc_name , ck_writer , e.emp_name AS "ck_writer_name" , to_char(ck_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ck_date" , ck_content , ck_result , ck_img from tb_check c join tb_machine m using(mc_no) join tb_emp e on (c.ck_writer = e.emp_no) where ck_no = #{ckNo}
mapper.update: update tb_check set ck_result = '2' where ck_no = #{ckNo}
update tb_machine set mc_status = '2' where mc_no = #{mcNo}
